frontmatter.title: Authorization for a Kotlin Spring backend, using JSON Web Tokens
frontmatter.description: Build authorization into your Kotlin backend by combining Auth0, JWTs and Spring Security to ensure only the right parties can execute operations

frontmatter.title: Painless JSON with Kotlin and jackson
frontmatter.description: Backends that provide a REST API or consume other APIs have to deal with JSON quite a lot. Luckily combining Kotlin and Jackson makes it a breeze

frontmatter.title: Mock verification in Kotlin using MockK and Atrium
frontmatter.description: When working with Kotlin you might need to build some non trivial mocks that need to be verified. Here is how to do it by combining MockK and Atrium

frontmatter.title: Recording APIs with WireMock
frontmatter.description: Using WireMock to record third party API calls you can get high quality mocks that reflect reality and are much easier to maintain
